reviews.review: Игра , просто топ ! но читеры , заебали.
Classic tac shooter, teamwork / communication / aim are all key. Beware of hackers. Consider using a 3rd party server such as esea or faceit.
If you're gonna get the game just make you get prime as well. Otherwise your lobbies will just be full of hackers and idiots.

The greatest game I ever play.
eğer yeni hesap açtıysanız oyun saçma şekilde sizi cift keleşe atarken sizden daha iyi oynayan eski oyuncular novadan çıkamıyor efsane
Ta gra jest rozjebana. Ruskie to śmiecie, niszczą innym rozgrywkę. Nie da sie w to grać. Nie polecam grać w te gre. Niszczy psyche. #psychasitting
Very nice and competitive, no hackers AT ALL <3

НУ КОРОЧ ИГРА НОРМ ВПРИНЦИПЕ, УБЕЙТЕСЬ ОБ СТЕНУ

Terrible matchmaking, Terrible ranking system, Terrible Anti-Cheat, Far too many non skilled weapons(Including the Awp), Valve couldn't give two shits about their game, Don't even bother opening up cases, Terrible muting system, Doesn't give a shit about throwers, and overall, shitty ass game. If you ever feel the need to want to rip your head out of your body, this is the right game for you. Am I still going to play this game and complain about how shitty it is? Yes I am. Thanks valve for ruining my life:)

ПРИВЕТ ГЕЙМЕРАМ ПЛАНЕТЫ Я НАСТОЯТЕЛЬНО РЕКОМЕНДУЮ ПОИГРАТЬ В ИГРУ Counter-Strike: Global Offensive ОТ VALVE ПОТОМУ ЧТО ЕСЛИ ТЫ НЕ СОБЕРАЕШСЯ ПЛАТИТЬ ДЕНЬГИ НА СТИМ КОШЕЛЬОК ДЛЯ СКИНОВ ТО МОЖНО ПОЛУЧАТЬ СКИНЫ ПОСЛЕ БОЯ ПРОДАВАТЬ НА ТОРГОВОЙ ПЛОЩАДКЕ ИХ И НАКОПИТЬ НА ИГРУ. This is a really good game for anybody looking to buy a fast passed game its there are multiple servers you can do surf competitive and casual this is personally one of my favorite games of all time
